snippet.title: Official Steam Launch Trailer | Sky: Children of the Light
snippet.description:
Join us as the enchanting world of Sky: Children of the Light celebrates its highly anticipated release on Steam! 

PC gamers and SteamDeck users will have the opportunity to discover the groundbreaking MMO experience of Sky, a world where inclusivity and spreading kindness are of the utmost importance.

The expansion to Steam opens up the Sky community to even more cross-play and cross-progression with players on other platforms. And with the PC visuals boasting 4K resolution and offering more control options, the playing experience is even more enhanced!

So take our hand as we officially launch Sky: Children of the Light on PC in early access!

Sky is available on:
Sony Playstation: https://bit.ly/SkySonyPlayStation
Nintendo Switch eShop: http://bit.ly/SkyNintendoSwitch
App Store: http://bit.ly/PlaySkyiOS
Google Play: http://bit.ly/SkyForAndroid
Sky on Steam: https://bit.ly/SkyPCSteam

Visit our website thatskygame.com, and stay tuned for more news via our social media:
Sky News: http://bit.ly/Sky_Blogs
Discord: http://bit.ly/Sky_Discord
Twitter: https://bit.ly/Sky_Twitter
Facebook: https://bit.ly/Sky_Facebook
Instagram: https://bit.ly/Sky_Insta
TikTok: http://bit.ly/Sky_TikTok
Twitch: http://bit.ly/TGC_Twitch
